scripts.version: node scripts/sync-version.js && git add src/utils.jsx android/app/build.gradle
scripts.release:patch: node scripts/confirm-release.js && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.release:minor: node scripts/confirm-release.js && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.release:major: node scripts/confirm-release.js && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
